nodes.long_description:
Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

The VR controls are super responsive (it feels like a human-shark mind meld): simply look where you want the shark to swim. Pull the trigger to move forward, press the grip button to chomp/eat things.
nodes.short_description: Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

nodes.change_log:
Release Notes - v0.1.23 - "SANDCASTLE"

Master all the twists and turns in the new Sandcastle map. Strategically place cannons to inflict maximum damage: who knows what's waiting around the corner!

New:
- New Map: Sandcastle
- New Weapon: place cannons to fire at any sharks in range
- More chest quests
- More stats

Fixes:
- Sharks drop items if they take damage
- Tire physics material
- Added 'Restore Purchases' in Settings

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.22 - "SUPER COLLIDER"

Finally, after almost two years of working on it we have a super robust collision system for the sharks. Not only does this mean your shark will be easier to control in tight spots (like caves, sunken ships, containers, etc), but it will also be able to wiggle through small openings while still being confined to the play area. It's also easier to throw objects more accurately. 

Even though it may seem like a minor update, this new system opens up the potential for some really cool and interesting future maps and game modes. Super!

New:
- Rebuilt shark motion and collision system based on rigidbodies and physics

Fixes:
- Easier to throw objects more accurately
- Snap turn check for valid position
- Sharks outside the boundary fix
- Increased alien bomb lock-on distance

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.21 - "LOBBY HOT FIX"

A quick fix to make sure you can see all the rooms available in the lobby. Also a tweak to the shark collider so you can access small spaces like the the ship window in the Original map and the OG wormhole (if you know, you know!)

New:
- New Weapon: Alien lock-on bomb added to Original map

Fixes:
- Scroll bar added to lobby view
- Shark collider fixed for accessing smaller spaces
- Updated to Meta XR SDK v.74.0.2

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.20 - "MEET YOU IN THE LOBBY"

We've made it easier than ever for you to play with your friends in SHARKS: there is now a multiplayer lobby that lists all the open rooms so you can see how many players are in each and what map and game mode is set. You can also create your own room and let your friends know where to meet you.

New:
- Multiplayer Lobby: view and join existing rooms
- Multiplayer: create or choose room
- Multiplayer: choose map
- Multiplayer: choose mode
- New Map: Alien
- New Mode: Free Mode
- New Weapon: Alien bomb locks-on to the nearest shark
- New Challenge: Collect squidians and send them home
- More unlockable skins and hats
- Steam: purchase skins and goldfish packs
- More diver jokes

Fixes:
- Increased snap turn speed x10
- Main map is now called 'Original' and has been tweaked for improved performance
- Cannonball explodes instantly on impact
- Improved shark physics and colliders
- Improved physics and interactions between objects: set off even more crazy chain reactions with jellyfish, mines, bombs, etc
- Zombie fix to reset the last player in a room
- Improved restoring items purchased outside the app

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.19 - "SHARK SHOP"

There's now a shark shop where you can spend your goldfish to unlock new cosmetic items. Items are refreshed every half-hour, so make sure you come back often to see what's available.

New:
- Shark Shop: new items available every half-hour
- Goldfish Pack: get more goldfish to unlock rare items
- More unlockable skins and hats
- Reward Chests: refresh way more often
- Biteable activation levers
- Sharks bite cooldown reduced for food (faster biting!)
- Bite tracker: how long can you bite and hold on to objects
- Challenges: Bite and hold objects to complete
- Biting toxic items causes damage (but not to zombies)

Fixes:
- Bite cooldown for other sharks tweaked
- Jellyfish slow rise fixed
- Crab collider tweaked
- Pufferfish tweaks
- Menu layout fixes

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie
